long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Red Ball 4" is an exciting game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, you control a red ball on a mission to save the world from evil squares that want to turn everything into a rectangle. You must navigate through various levels filled with obstacles, traps, and enemies to reach the end and defeat the boss.

As the red ball, you can roll, jump, and bounce your way through the colorful and challenging platformer levels. Collect stars along the way to unlock bonus levels and power-ups that will help you in your quest.

The game features intuitive controls and smooth gameplay, making it accessible and enjoyable for players of all ages. With its vibrant graphics, catchy sound effects, and engaging gameplay, "Red Ball 4" offers a fun and addictive gaming experience.

You can play "Red Ball 4" for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/ along with other unblocked games. So, get ready to roll and embark on an epic adventure to save the world in this exciting platformer game!
